description.english: I'm Camilo Laiton, Masters student in Systems Engineering with substantial experience in deep learning, process development, image processing, and computer vision with the goal of developing AI-based solutions to address real-world challenges.
description.spanish: Soy Camilo Laiton, Estudiante de maestría en Ingeniería de Sistemas con experiencia sustancial en aprendizaje profundo, desarrollo de procesos, procesamiento de imágenes y visión por computadora con el objetivo de desarrollar soluciones basadas en IA para abordar los desafíos del mundo real.

spanish.title: Un modelo computacional basado en aprendizaje profundo para estimación dinámica del tiempo de los semáforos en intersecciones urbanas simples

english.title: A computational deep learning-based model for dynamic estimation of the traffic signal timing in simple urban intersections

pubs.title: A CNN-based model for dynamic traffic signal timing estimation at simple urban intersections

images.desc: Simulation of the proposed solution using SUMO simulator.
Car classification using YoloV3 model trained with COCO dataset.

english.title: Method for the segmentation of brain magnetic resonance images using a neural network architecture based on attention models

pubs.title: Deep 3D neural network for brain structures segmentation using self-attention modules in MRI images
Self-attention unet-based architecture for gray matter segmentation in brain imaging
Skull stripping of MRI images using a deep 3D neural network with self-attention modules

images.desc: Segmented brain MRI in the axial plane using the proposed architecture.
Segmented brain MRI in the coronal plane using the proposed architecture.
Segmented brain MRI in the saggital plane using the proposed architecture.
Proposed 3D deep neural network architecture for the segmentation of 37 brain structures.
Segmented brain using the proposed architecture in a 3d visual representation.

spanish.title: Pipeline de procesamiento de datos para imagenes microscopicas cerebrales de gran escala

english.title: A large-scale image processing pipeline for whole-brain light-sheet microscopy data identifying cell locations and brain structures in Terabytes of data.

pubs.title: A Scalable, modular pipeline for automated processing and segmentation for whole-brain light microscopy data

english.title: Software Engineer III - Computer Vision
description: In charge of a large-scale image processing pipeline in the cloud, which has processed 3 PBs (~3000 mesoscale whole-brains) at the moment.
Retrospective flatfield correction applied to large-scale data (hundreds of GBs to many TBs).
Development of a template to be able to register brains acquired from light-sheet imaging to the Common Coordinate Framework (CCF).
Large-scale mRNA identification using cloud computing resources.
Large-scale deep learning cell segmentation using cloud computing resources.
Large-scale cell deep learning detection (ZYX positions) in brain acquired with lightsheet microscopes.
Foundational model for brain imaging data from lightsheet microscopy.
Deep learning model for Bassoon and PSD95 protein prediction (neuronal synapse) from pan-protein signal.

spanish.title: Desarrollador de software III - Visión por computadora
description: Responsable de un sistema de procesamiento de imágenes a gran escala en la nube, que actualmente ha procesado 3 PBs.
Corrección retrospectiva de campo plano aplicada a datos a gran escala (de cientos de GB a muchos TB).
Desarrollo de una plantilla para registrar cerebros adquiridos mediante microscopía de lámina de luz en el Marco de Coordenadas Comunes (CCF).
Identificación de ARNm a gran escala mediante recursos de computación en la nube.
Segmentación celular a gran escala mediante aprendizaje profundo con recursos de computación en la nube.
Detección celular a gran escala mediante aprendizaje profundo (posiciones ZYX) en cerebros adquiridos con microscopios de lámina de luz.
Modelo fundamental para datos de imágenes cerebrales de microscopía de lámina de luz.
Modelo de aprendizaje profundo para la predicción de proteínas Bassoon y PSD95 (sinapsis neuronal) a partir de canales de pan-proteínas.

english.title: Software Engineer II - Computer Vision
description: Development of image processing pipelines for light-sheet microscope images using Code Ocean and AWS.
Some of the image processing steps are: destriping, 3D reconstruction, format image conversion to OME-Zarr, atlas registration, and explorative analysis on cell segmentation and mRNA detection.
Development of a bioimage analysis software package to estimate stitching errors in large-scale microscopy datasets.
Automated data upload to AWS using a HPC cluster.
Working with large-scale data from hundreds of GBs to many TBs from very high-resolution microscopes.

spanish.title: Desarrollador de software
description: Desarrollo de flujos de trabajo de procesamiento de imágenes para imágenes de microscopio de lámina de luz utilizando Code Ocean y AWS.

Algunos de los pasos del procesamiento de imágenes son: eliminación de bandas, reconstrucción 3D, conversión de formato de imagen a OME-Zarr, registro de atlas y análisis exploratorio sobre segmentación celular y detección de ARN.
Desarrollo de un paquete de software de análisis de bioimágenes para estimar errores de unión en conjuntos de datos de microscopía a gran escala.
Carga automatizada de datos a AWS mediante un clúster HPC.
Trabajo con datos a gran escala desde cientos de GB hasta muchos TB de microscopios de muy alta resolución.

projects.organization: Technological Instutute of Soledad Atlantico - ITSA

english.title: Software Developer
description: Software Developer in a Multiparametric Intelligent System for the recognition of patterns associated with neurocognitive dysfunctions in young people
Reviewed the state of the art tools for the segmentation of brain anatomical structures
Installation of tools on Linux environments
Developed the intermediary module in Python for the automatic use of brain image segmentation tools

Desarrollo de un visualizador 3D optimizado en memoria para la personalización de ropa usando Three.js
Implementación y despliegue del módulo de personalización de prendas en 3D
Elegido mejor proyecto de innovación por SENA INNOVA en Colombia en 2019-2020

english.title: Research Associate
description: Designed a calculation tool based on simulation software that allows a technical analysis of electromobility solutions for rail-river transport

Provided support and analysis of dual-use technologies incorporating electromobility technologies available in the Colombian and international market, identifying the map of actors, costs of the proposals, and those responsible for the actions and the time required for their materialization
